iframe.aria-label: Drive, Canvassing Notice__REVISED__ on District Letterhead 4-10-2020.pdf

div.aria-label: Drive, Canvassing Notice__REVISED__ on District Letterhead 4-10-2020.pdf

h2.div: OPEN ENROLLMENT WINDOW IS OPENING SOON

div.p: The 2020-21 Regular Open Enrollment Application Period begins on Monday, February 3rd and runs through April 30, 2020. If you know of any families possibly interested in joining our Riverview family, please have them contact our school office at 262-889-4384 and we would be delighted to provide information or give a school tour.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Congratulations to the Riverview Boys Basketball B team for their 2nd place finish at the Comet Classic over the weekend! Way to go guys!!

h3.div: WE want YOU for the Virtual Talent Show!

We are so excited to present a new-aged talent show for everyone to enjoy. This is going to be so much fun!!! We cannot wait to see all the amazing acts. This is a variety show so all style of acts are welcomed. Singing, dancing, magic show, small act play, famous speech reenactment. Don't forget to get the family involved too!

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

h3.div: All auditions must be sent in by April 17th
We will critique each performance and send back a few pointers.
Next, each act must send in their full out dress rehearsal performance via the email above. Due by May 1st, 2020. If any adjustments need to be made, then a final copy will need to be sent.

A final copy should be submitted to above email address by May 9th. We will slice the performances together into acts and add commentary introductions. We may have a few google classroom practices with the acts alone. The full performances will be virtual on Riverview's website May 30th, 2020. Please include sending in your act via email the following information:
- Names of people in the act.
Any questions or concerns, please contact us at talentshow@silverlakejt1.k12.wi.us

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Because of the mandated school closure, Riverview is applying to the Wisconsin DPI for a waiver of their Instructional Hours requirement and is having a public hearing at our April 27 Board Meeting. While we have been providing virtual /distance learning activities since school was closed March 13, the waiver is required because we (and nearly every district in the state) will not be able to meet the face-to-face instructional hours typical in a normal school year. Comments can be shared via the following email address: waiver@silverlakejt1.k12.wi.us , or a comment can be dropped off in the school lobby.
